text: Here are the details for The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 5 release date and time, which is just around the corner. The episode is titled “Feel Her Love.” In the previous episode, “Day One,” Ellie and Dina found themselves caught in the crossfire during a brutal battle between the Seraphites and the militia. Meanwhile, FEDRA agents encountered and fought against a surprising foe. Here’s all you need to know. When is The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 5 release date & time? The episode’s release date is May 11, 2025, and its release time is 9 p.m. Eastern Time (ET) and 6 p.m. Pacific Time (PT). Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeMay 11, 202509:00 p.m.Pacific TimeMay 11, 202506:00 p.m. Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in The Last of Us Season 2 right here. Where to watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 5 You can watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 5 via HBO and HBO Max. HBO functions as a pay television service, while Max serves as a subscription-based OTT platform. HBO Max boasts an impressive catalog of films, television shows, animated series, and documentaries, both licensed and original. Additionally, its library also includes projects drawn from other WB Discovery-owned networks like Adult Swim, CNN, and Animal Planet. What is The Last of Us about? In The Last of Us Season 2, Joel and Ellie have settled down in Jackson Hole, but their relationship has become strained since he lied to her about the events of Season 1’s finale. After a personal tragedy occurs, Ellie goes on a long quest for revenge against those responsible. The official synopsis for The Last of Us is as follows: “Twenty years after modern civilization has been destroyed, Joel, a hardened survivor, is hired to smuggle Ellie, a 14-year-old girl, out of an oppressive quarantine zone. What starts as a small job soon becomes a brutal, heartbreaking journey, as they both must traverse the United States and depend on each other for survival.”
html:
Here are the details for The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 5 release date and time, which is just around the corner. The episode is titled “Feel Her Love.” In the previous episode, “Day One,” Ellie and Dina found themselves caught in the crossfire during a brutal battle between the Seraphites and the militia. Meanwhile, FEDRA agents encountered and fought against a surprising foe.

Here’s all you need to know.

When is The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 5 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is May 11, 2025, and its release time is 9 p.m. Eastern Time (ET) and 6 p.m. Pacific Time (PT).

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in The Last of Us Season 2 right here.

Where to watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 5

You can watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 5 via HBO and HBO Max.

HBO functions as a pay television service, while Max serves as a subscription-based OTT platform. HBO Max boasts an impressive catalog of films, television shows, animated series, and documentaries, both licensed and original. Additionally, its library also includes projects drawn from other WB Discovery-owned networks like Adult Swim, CNN, and Animal Planet.

What is The Last of Us about?

In The Last of Us Season 2, Joel and Ellie have settled down in Jackson Hole, but their relationship has become strained since he lied to her about the events of Season 1’s finale. After a personal tragedy occurs, Ellie goes on a long quest for revenge against those responsible.

The official synopsis for The Last of Us is as follows:

“Twenty years after modern civilization has been destroyed, Joel, a hardened survivor, is hired to smuggle Ellie, a 14-year-old girl, out of an oppressive quarantine zone. What starts as a small job soon becomes a brutal, heartbreaking journey, as they both must traverse the United States and depend on each other for survival.”
